name: Regilian Worm
overview: Regilian Worm is a 1-player arcade game for the TRS-80. As a mighty intergalactic regilian worm, you search out succulent zandszbards to eat. The little beggars are tasty, though a bit explosive. The more you eat, the bigger you grow. The player controls a progressively elongating worm, that must move about and eat zandszbards. If the player strikes their tail or the edge of the screen, it's game over. There are 4 levels of difficulty with 9 speed options.
